meanings: (여럿 가운데서) distinguish[differentiate] (A from B), make a distinction (between A and B)
(음식 등을) be choosy, be fussy (about), (informal) be picky (about)
(보이지 않도록) hide, cover, (formal) conceal, screen (sth from sth), obscure, (보호하다) shield

vlive.korean: 가리는 사람이 있었나? Was there a person who hid their face? 듣기 View video NCT : みんな本当にありがとう！！
vlive.english: Was there a person who hid their face?

vlive.korean: 죄지었나요? 왜 그렇게까지 가리는 거예요? Why? Did you do something bad? Why are you trying so hard to cover your face? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: Why? Did you do something bad? Why are you trying so hard to cover your face?

vlive.korean: [은니 얘기 나온 후로 입 가리는 울 뵹아리] 이렇게 보니까... [He keeps covering his mouth ever since] When I look at myself... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VICTON] 뿅디가 또..💕 우리 뿅디 담요 평생 거꾸로 쓰게 해주세요🙏 (So cute Byungchan's late-night radio)
vlive.english: [He keeps covering his mouth ever since] When I look at myself...

examples.korean: Do not judge men by mere appearances; for the light laughter that bubbles on the lip often mantles over the depths of sadness, and the serious look may be the sober veil that covers a divine peace and joy. (Edward Chapin) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 단순히 외모로 사람을 평가하지 말라. 입술에서 터지는 가벼운 웃음은 종종 깊은 슬픔을 감추고, 심각한 표정은 신성한 평화와 기쁨을 가리는 수수한 베일일 수 있기 때문이다. (에드워드 채핀, 행복명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Do not judge men by mere appearances; for the light laughter that bubbles on the lip often mantles over the depths of sadness, and the serious look may be the sober veil that covers a divine peace and joy. (Edward Chapin) Add to Wordbook
